data.title: Verify cosmetology licenses and exams
data.text:
License certification

If you want to get licensed in another state or to get a license by reciprocity, a representative from that state may use our professional license lookup to find:

Current license status

The date we first issued the license

Types of licenses held in Washington

Upon request, we can email verification to confirm license status, education hours completed, or examination results. We don't mail verification letters.

Minimum exams and scores

Learn more about the cosmetology exams Washington requires.

Applicants must meet these minimum exam and score requirements to get their first license in Washington:

October 1, 2013 to Present

Exams: NIC Practical and NIC Written

Score: 75%

October 1, 2010 to September 20, 2013

Exams: State Practical and State Written

Score: 75%

February 1, 2006 to September 30, 2010

Exams: NIC Practical and NIC Written

Score: 75%

July 1, 2002 to January 31, 2006

Exams: NIC Practical and State Written

Score: 76%

July 1, 1984 to June 30, 2002:

Exams: State Written

Score: 76%

Before July 1, 1984

Exams: State Practical and State Written

Score: 76%

Disciplinary actions
